thread.title: Health insurer Cigna to buy Express Scripts

title: Health insurer Cigna to buy Express Scripts
text:
Health insurer Cigna to buy Express Scripts Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 02:03 
U.S. health insurer Cigna struck a deal worth almost $53 billion to buy pharmacy benefits manager Express Scripts Holding Co. on Thursday, as the healthcare industry deals with rising drug costs, changes to the Affordable Care Act and heightened competition.
